description:
The look back at the legend of Montblanc Noland and Kalgara the warrior continues with the story of how these two very different men suddenly found friendship - and then lost it just as quickly!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Free from the Spell! The Great Warrior Sheds Tears!
Jubaku kara no Kaihou! Daisenshi ga Nagashita Namida!!
La malédiction est levée ! Les larmes du grand guerrier
ปลดปล่อยจากคำสาป! น้ำตาที่หลั่งไหลของยอดนักรบ!!
呪縛からの解放! 大戦士が流した涙!!
